product_name: Crocs Crocband Mickey II Clogs - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Just like the adult version but with Mickey's personal touch, the Crocs Crocband Mickey II Clogs for girls offer the comfort of Crocs with a familiar silhouette. Heel strap swings forward so they can slip clogs on easily or swings back for a snug fit around the heel. Composed entirely of a patented, closed-cell resin material that softens and molds to feet with body heat-incredibly light and easy to clean. Resin is antimicrobial to help control odors and has a high coefficient of friction to resist slippage; plus, shoes even float! Built-in arch supports, orthotic-style heels, and tarsal bars hold feet comfortably; tiny nubs stimulate circulation and refresh feet. Crocs Crocband Mickey II Clogs for girls feature a nonmarking sole that leaves no trace. Closeout.
short_description: Just like the adult version but with Mickey's personal touch, the Crocs Crocband Mickey II Clogs for girls offer the comfort of Crocs with a familiar silhouette.
